snippet.title: Judofuri - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3013460/Judofuri/

Welcome to Judofuri! A local party game with cute little fruits from 2 to 9 players, where you only need one button to play. Face off in a variety of easy-to-pickup, fast-paced mini-games, and claim your spot as the juiciest fruit of 'em all!
